text: Gay, sitting opposite Gavin on the terrace could hardly believe that she was the same girl, miserable, shy, who had sat at the little table for the first time a few days ago. Gavin raised his glass to her and smiled and Gay's heart turned over."I'd like to do that." Gavin drained his glass and refilled it.
